RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 1 7F Dirt CR: 75. Maiden Claiming Purse 40000. (UP TO $6,960 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LA GROTTE chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn, got let out swinging four wide into upper stretch, angled in to the inside just inside the three-sixteenths rallying to seize command a furlong out, then inched away under a drive to prevail. TOOSHAY chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled out eight wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. GRACEFUL chased just off the inside coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung three wide into upper stretch, kicked on belatedly to secure the show honors. BEST COAST chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch offered up a bid a furlong out, then weakened in the late stages. NEGRA GATA coaxed from the gate, prompted the pace just off the inside, advanced to take command near the quarter pole, swung three wide for home, dug in and was headed a furlong out, then weakened in the late stages. SCHERZER coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand along the inside coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, yielded the front and spun just off the inside into upper stretch, then tired in the stretch. BE BEST three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch, tired. DON'T TELL AMY coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside down the backstretch and then two to three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled seven wide into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.OWNER: Flying P Stable West Paces Racing LLC Murray Robert E and Lyden Michael P
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 2-3w 3/8, 7w upper, tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, ins turn, 4w upper, angled in, up 1/8, inched away

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5-4w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, bid 1/8p, wknd late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Gio Ponti S. BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 2 1M Turf CR: 97. Stakes Purse 135000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS. Non-Lasix Race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $135 each which should accompany the nomination; $675 to pass the entry box and an additional $675 to start. For horses n ot originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $675 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided 55% to the owner of the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to fourth,4 % to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight 124 lbs. Non-winners of a sweepstake at a mile or over in 2023 allowed 2 lbs.; of two races other than maiden, claiming, starter or state bred allowance, 4 lbs. The New York Racinn g Association reserves the right to transfer this race to the main track. A presentation will be made to the winning owner. Closed Saturday, September 23, 2023 with 14 Original Nominations and 1 Supplement. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NORTHERN INVADER bobbled at the break, recovered to race just off the inside forwardly placed into the first turn, advanced to take over just inside six furlongs to go, showed the way in hand from the two path patiently handled until set down continuing just off the inside into upper stretch, edged clear under a drive to the eighth pole, held safe to the finish to prevail. OHANA HONOR just off the inside tracking from the front from the tail of the field, came under coaxing near the quarter pole tipping out to swing six then five wide into upper stretch, got brushed by APPRAISE straightened away, offered up a mild kick to secure the place honors while well clear of the rest and second best. BAT FLIP tracked the pace along the inside a bit eager into the backstretch and under restraint, advanced half a mile from home when CITY FEVER vacated the rail in front, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened. CITY FEVER led early along the inside, got displaced from command just inside six furlongs to run, tracked the front along the rail until tipped to the two path taking up cover behind the leader half a mile from home, tipped three wide through the far turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued three wide into upper stretch and weakened. APPRAISE (IRE) grew rank under restraint in the two path into the first turn skygazing and climbing a bit keenly, tracked just off the inside coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, swung five then four wide into upper stretch under a drive, brushed with OHANA HONOR at the three-sixteenths and came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: City Fever
ENTRY.COMMENT: led early ins, tip 2p 1/2p, coaxed 3w 5/16, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Bat Flip
ENTRY.OWNER: Harrell Ventures LLC and Starlight Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, advanced 1/2p, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Northern Invader
ENTRY.OWNER: West Point Thoroughbreds and Ingordo David
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, up ins 3/4p, in hand 2p, 2w 1/4p, edged clear, safe

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Anderson Farms Ont. Inc. & Peter A.Berglar Racing Interest

ENTRY.NAME: Ohana Honor
ENTRY.OWNER: West Point Thoroughbreds Woodford Racing LLC and Hudson Jr Edward J
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, coaxed near 1/4, 6-5w upper, mild kick, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Appraise (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: rank early 2p, tracked 2p, 5-4w upper, brush foe, empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 87. Claiming Purse 36000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances ) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MARIAH'S FORTUNE coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside and then just off the inside advancing on the leader nearing the quarter pole, swung four to five wide into upper stretch let out for the drive, seized command straightened away and edged clear kept to task. SUSPENDED CAMPAIGN devoid of speed, chased just off the inside down the backstretch before going four to five wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went seven wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick to secure the place honors. ITS COLD IN DEHERE chased two to three wide, came under coaxing four wide at the three-eighths, angled two to three wide into upper stretch and ran on to procure the show honors. ALPINE QUEEN dueled from the two path with GAME THEORY to the inside, took over sole command three furlongs from home, shook off her main pace rival and swung three wide into upper stretch confronted by the top one, yielded the front straightened away, then weakened in the final furlong. LINNY KATE coaxed from the gate, chased four to five wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, continued four to five wide for home, weakened in the stretch. TRADE SECRET coaxed from the gate, chased three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch, weakened. VALLARAND hustled from the gate, chased along the inside, briefly tipped four wide at the nine-sixteenths before making her way back to the inside through the turn, spun just off the inside for home and weakened. GAME THEORY coaxed from the gate, dueled inside of ALPINE QUEEN from the start, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, got shaken off through the latter portion of the turn and took the inside route into upper stretch, then folded in the drive. WAIT A MINUTE chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four to five wide into upper stretch, faltered and was eased home to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Mariah's Fortune
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, 2p turn, set down 4-5w uppr, edged away

ENTRY.NAME: Vallarand
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, chased ins, briefly 4w 9/16, ins turn, 2w 1/4p, wknd

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2-3w, coaxed 4w 3/8, 2-3w upper, ran on

ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2p, up near 3/8, 3w upper, yielded, weakened late

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 5w 3/8, 7w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, dueled ins, coaxed 7/16, shaken off, ins 1/4, folded

ENTRY.NAME: Trade Secret
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, weakened

ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 4-5w upper, faltered, eased home

ENTRY.NAME: Linny Kate
ENTRY.OWNER: Final Turn Racing Stable LLC and PlayingTheField Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 5-4w, coaxed 3/8, 4-5w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Ashley T. Cole S. BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 4 1 1/8M Outer turf CR: 105. Stakes Purse 125000. OUTER TURF FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Non-Lasix Race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $125 each which should ac company the nomination; $625 to pass the entry box and an additional $625 to start. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $625 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided 55% to the owner of the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to fourth, 4% to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weights: Three year olds, 122 lbs. Older 126 lbs. Non-winners of a sweepstake in 2023 allow ed 2 lbs.; of a two races other than maiden, claiming, starter or state-bred allowance in 2022-23 allowed 4 lbs. A trophy will be presented to the winning owner. The New York Racing Association reserves the right to transfer this race to the Main Track. C
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPIRIT OF ST LOUIS just off the inside tracking from mid pack, came under light coaxing before being set down angled four wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command with three-sixteenths to go, then inched away under a drive kept to task. JERRY THE NIPPER attended the leader from the outside in the two path, advanced to take narrow and brief command swinging three wide into upper stretch, got headed at the three-sixteenths, dug in under a drive running on to secure the place honors. CITY MAN settled just off the inside at the tail of the field, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick and shied out under a left handed crop a sixteenth out while clear for the show honors. BARRAGE chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, offered no response. KINGDOM ON PAWS coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. UN OJO coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand along the inside, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch under threat, yielded the front and tired.

ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased inside, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 5 7F Dirt CR: 96. Starter Allowance Purse 65000. (UP TO $11,310 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allow ed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FORCED RANKING vied three then two wide between foes, took over sole command at the three-eighths, got let out spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, edged clear under a drive to prevail. AMERICAN LAW vied four wide outside a pair, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three to four wide for home, ran on to secure the place honors. GIROOVIN broke in at the start bumping KUSHAN BRIDGE, chased just off the inside under a ride from the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, kept on through to the finish. KUNSHAN BRIDGE bobbled at the break, then got bumped by GIROOVIN, who broke inwards, vied from the two path inside pair before tucking inside through the turn, continued in the inside route into upper stretch and weakened in the final furlong. FIGHT FIERCELY coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. BORN A GAMBLER stumbled at the start, chased five wide throughout under coaxing from the three-eighths and tired. DISAPPEARANCE sluggish early on seven to eight paths off the inside, tucked to the two path with five furlongs to run well behind, cornered two to three wide into upper stretch and made no impact. BIG VENEZUELA coaxed from the start, chased six paths off the inside throughout coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, got placed to a protective hold after spinning six wide into upper stretch and was eased home to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Fight Fiercely
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased inside, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Disappearance
ENTRY.COMMENT: sluggish early 7-8w, to 2p 5/8p, 2-3w upper, no impact

ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled, bumped st, vied 2p, ins turn, inside 1/4, weakened

ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, chased 5w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3-2w, up 3/8, let out 2w 1/4p, edged clear

ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 4w, coaxed 3/8, 3-4w upper, dug in, ran on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 6 1 1/16M Turf CR: 94. Claiming Purse 41000. (UP TO $7,134 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time O f Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EMPIRE ATTRACTION dueled from the three path with CARPE'S DREAM to his inside, got set down spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in continuing to knock heads through the stretch to the finish coming in slightly and trading a brush with his main rival seventy yards from home as that foe came out slightly and was gamely just up in the shadow of the wire. CARPE'S DREAM dueled inside of the aforementioned foe coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in continuing the head to head combat through to the wire clinging to command in game fashion, came out slightly as EMPIRE ATTRACTION came in slightly and traded a brush seventy yards out, then got nailed in the final jumps. ARUBA three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive running on to secure the show honors. FORWARDLY chased just off the inside until tucked inside into the far turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid. LUCKY LUCKY LUKE chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, passed tired rivals. MAMA BANNED ME chased along the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, offered no response. INTO IT chased two to three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, weakened. FORWARD MOVE chased two to three wide under coaxing from three furlongs out, angled four wide into upper stretch, weakened. NO REGARD chased two to three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, cut the corner into upper stretch, weakened. ABLETON pulled rank and eager under restraint early on along the inside and then just off the inside before settling midway on the turn, tracked the front just off the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths and tired.

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, weakened

RACE.FOOTNOTES: DRUM ROLL PLEASE five paths off the inside just off the pace dispute, tucked four wide through the turn advancing to stack outside the top trio midway, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and took over command swinging four then three wide into upper stretch, dug in under threat to the outside a furlong out, rebuffed that challenge and edged clear to the finish. HUNT BALL chased three to four wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung five then four wide into upper stretch, rallied to latch on the aforementioned foe a furlong out, then got repelled and shaken off inside the final eighth while along clear for the place honors. PENTATHLON vied three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, ran on to secure the show honors. HOULTON chased just off the inside under coaxing from three furlongs out, angled five wide into upper stretch, kept on through to the finish. ENLIGHTEN vied four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. UNIQUE INSIGHT chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four wide into upper stretch, tired. HAMILTON'S WAY chased along the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch and tired. TRUCKER vied inside a pair of rivals coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and tired.

(If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CLEAR VISION tracked the pace along the inside, got set down spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, rallied to take command a furlong out, edged clear under a drive kept to task. MAXWELL ESQUIRE got bumped at the start by PRINCIPLED STAND, chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch, ran on to secure the place honors. LANDBISCUIT chased three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, kept on to the finish to just get up for the show honors in the final jumps. NOLO CONTESTO tracked the pace just off the inside, took over command swinging two to three wide into upper stretch let out for the drive, dug in under threat and was collared a furlong out, kept on to the finish. HIGH TIDE chased two to three wide early on and then three to four wide through the far turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, went eight to nine wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild bid. EYES ON TARGET three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, went seven wide into upper stretch and stayed on one paced to the finish. ORIGINAL stumbled badly at the start, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung five wide into upper stretch, offered no response. KLICKITAT chased along the inside, got set down angled four wide into upper stretch, offered no response. PRINCIPLED STAND (GB) stumbled at the start recovering inwards and bumping MAXWELL ESQUIRE, showed the way rated along the inside, yielded the front near the quarter pole and cut the corner into upper stretch, then was not persevered with through to the finish.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 10 1 3/16M Dirt CR: 103. Allowance Purse 100000. (UP TO $17,400 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WINTERS LION got bumped at the start by SIGNATOR due to pressure from PADDINGTON and was forced to steady off the heels of SUERTE, settled just off the inside at the tail of the field early on, took to the rail through the first turn before heading back to the two path down the backstretch detached at the rear, remained patiently handled tipped three wide through the far turn coming under coaxing near the five-sixteenths, swung six wide into upper stretch, closed well outside and collared a trio battling head to head just inside the final seventy yards to prevail at the end. MISTICAL CURLIN tracked the leader just off the inside in closest aim, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung two to three wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive getting on near even terms near the sixteenth pole, battled on between rivals nose to nose through to the finish and was up for the place honors when overhauled by the top one late. DRAKE'S PASSAGE three wide through the first turn, chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive getting on near even terms with a pair a sixteenth from home, fought on to the finish and was just up for the show honors in the final jumps. SUERTE established the front and showed the way in hand along the inside, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under threat from a pair and stubbornly clung to command by a sliver fending them off until collared inside seventy yards from home, then lost the bob at the end for the place and show honors. SIGNATOR got bumped at the start by PADDINGTON and in turn bumped WINTERS LION, chased just off the inside until tucked inside into the far turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four to five wide for home and stayed on one paced through to the finish. PADDINGTON broke out at the start bumping SIGNATOR into WINTERS LION, raced three wide through the first turn before chasing four to five wide thereafter, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages.

ENTRY.NAME: Mistical Curlin

ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, coaxed 3/8, 2-3w upper, dug in, battled on, up 2nd

ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w 1st turn, chased 3-4w, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, fought on

ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, 3w 1st trn, chased 4-5w, coax 3/8, 5w uppr, wknd late

ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 2p, coaxed ins 5/16, 4-5w upper, one paced

ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, steadied st, 2-3w at rear, 6w uppr, closed well, up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 11 6F Outer turf CR: 75. Maiden Claiming Purse 43000. OUTER TURF FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Cl aim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 24 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIM broke out at the start, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command just inside the eighth pole, dug in to inch away to the finish to prevail. GALATRONA tracked the pace along the inside twice restrained off heels of a rival, got set down spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, rallied to take command near the eighth pole, got collared just inside that station and ran on willingly for the place honors clear of the rest. STONE OF DESTINY chased four paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide for home and kept on to secure the show honors. GOTHAM GRAY chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. DANCE WITH ME BABE showed the way in hand just off the inside, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in and was collared nearing the eighth pole, then weakened through to the finish. FOLLOW THE FED chased just off the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung three wide for home, offered up a bid but was made no headway. RED BUTTERFLY chased along the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, swung three to four wide for home, weakened. UNHOLY broke a beat slow and was steadied at the start, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing midway on the turn, went five to six wide into upper stretch and made no impact. DRAMATIC EFFECT coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, made no impact.
